label: NCPR
description: Normative Consumption to Net Per Capita Production Ratio

label: Poverty
description: Population living below the poverty line (%)

label: Road and water access
description: Villages lacking access to roads that are passable by fourwheeled vehicle or to waterways passable by boat (%)

label: Clean water
description: Households without access to clean drinking water at a distance of more than 10 meters from a septic tank (%)

label: Health
description: Villages with health facilities greater than 5 kilometers away (%)

label: Female illiteracy
description: Women and girls over 15 years of age who cannot read or write (%)
